text: Gölenkamp is a community in Bentheim in Lower Saxony. ==Geography== ===Place=== Gölenkamp is northwest of Nordhorn. It belongs to the Joint Community (Samtgemeinde) of Uelsen, whose administrative seat is in the town of the same name. ===Constituent communities=== The community’s three centres are Gölenkamp, Haftenkamp and Hardinghausen. ==References== ==Other websites== *Joint community’s webpage Category:County of Bentheim (district)
title: Gölenkamp
